block.heading: Time Zones
block.subHeading: Our work timings are based on what the client wants. We work round the clock. We are always flexible and available.

block.heading: Communication
block.subHeading: English is widely spoken in India and Bangalore being the IT hub, there is no dearth of finding resources who have experience working with the cross-country resource pool. Also, we keep connected through all the available social means such as video calls, email correspondence and instant messaging.

block.heading: Project Management
block.subHeading: We let the client access the real time data through varied Project Management tools to monitor your deliveries.

block.heading: Delayed Deliveries
block.subHeading: Our Offshore Development Center is efficient and reliable. We make sure that work is always done on time, every time.

block.heading: Scalable Resources
block.subHeading: Possibility of easily upscaling or downscaling of resources according to the project needs or budget.

block.heading: Requirements
block.subHeading: We give a lot of importance in gathering information and requirements. We have multiple workshops or have a discovery period for in-depth analysis of business requirements, which is done before the project is developed.
